alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:57AM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations of 0.10 to 0.25 inch are likely. * WHERE...The Saint Lawrence Valley of New York along with eastern Addison, eastern Rutland, Orange, and Windsor counties in Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of ice accumulations will occur this morning through the early evening hours. Light freezing drizzle will be possible tonight through Sunday morning leading to additional ice accretion.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
